description: Listen to our honored Chief Guest

cards2.title: Sohail Pathan
cards2.description: I have been contributing to the developer communities for more than 5+ Years. I’m the person who just can’t sit and code but is more interested in sharing knowledge with the circle, which led to becoming a tech community manager. I have worked with ed-tech and SaaS startups and helped them grow their community base to the moon. Currently, Leading Developer Advocacy at ApyHub. Travel & Food is <3
